name: 3Boost
overview:
3Boost makes custom Blu-Ray and DVD photo slideshows. After a customer places an order on the site, 3Boost sends a pre-paid and pre-addressed package to the customer to put as many photos as they want included on the slideshow. The package also includes a 2GB USB flash drive for the customer to have digital photos included in the slideshow. The customer is able to specify captions and any music they want to play in the background.

3Boost makes the photo slideshow video with professional effects and transitions. The DVD or Blu-Ray comes in a case with custom labeling, and the disk has an interactive menu. The total price is 79.95 for DVD and 89.95 for Blu-Ray, all shipping is included, the slideshow can be up to one hour in length with unlimited photos.

3Boost has 11 employees all located in the Dallas-Fort Worth metroplex, and is a sole proprietorship under A.J. Horst.
